CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.upsert_special_price(customer_uuid uuid, product_uuid uuid, new_price numeric)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE sql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
    INSERT INTO public.daftar_harga_mitra (customer_id, product_id, harga_spesial)
    VALUES (customer_uuid, product_uuid, new_price)
    ON CONFLICT (customer_id, product_id) DO UPDATE
    SET harga_spesial = new_price;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.search_customers(search_term text)
 RETURNS SETOF customers
 LANGUAGE sql
AS $function$
  SELECT * FROM public.customers
  WHERE
    nama_pelanggan ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
    telepon ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%';
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_simulation_image_url(p_product_id uuid, p_object_id uuid)
 RETURNS text
 LANGUAGE sql
AS $function$
    SELECT colored_image_url
    FROM public.simulation_variants
    WHERE
        product_id = p_product_id AND simulation_object_id = p_object_id

$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.search_products(search_term text, merek_filter text, kategori_filter text, status_filter text, low_stock_only boolean)
 RETURNS SETOF products
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT *
    FROM
        public.products
    WHERE
        (
            search_term IS NULL OR search_term = '' OR
            kode ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            nama ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            merek ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            kategori ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%'
        )
        AND (merek_filter = 'semua' OR merek ILIKE merek_filter)
        AND (kategori_filter = 'semua' OR kategori ILIKE kategori_filter)
        AND (status_filter = 'semua' OR status ILIKE status_filter)
        AND (low_stock_only = false OR (stok <= stok_min))
    ORDER BY
        updated_at DESC NULLS LAST;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_unique_request_categories()
 RETURNS TABLE(kategori text)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
  RETURN QUERY
  SELECT DISTINCT pc.kategori
  FROM public.permintaan_pelanggan pc
  WHERE pc.kategori IS NOT NULL AND pc.kategori <> '';
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_dashboard_metrics(start_date text, end_date text)
 RETURNS TABLE(sales_value numeric, profit_value numeric, transactions_count bigint)
 LANGUAGE sql
AS $function$
    SELECT
        COALESCE(SUM(total_akhir), 0) as sales_value,
        COALESCE(SUM(total_laba), 0) as profit_value,
        COUNT(*) as transactions_count
    FROM
        public.transactions
    WHERE
        created_at >= start_date::timestamp AND created_at <= end_date::timestamp;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.search_sales_orders(search_term text, status_filter text, mitra_id_filter uuid, start_date_filter date, end_date_filter date)
 RETURNS SETOF sales_order_list_view
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT *
    FROM public.sales_order_list_view
    WHERE
        (
            search_term IS NULL OR search_term = '' OR
            so_number ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            invoice_number ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            nama_pelanggan ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%'
        )
        AND (status_filter = 'semua' OR final_status = status_filter)
        AND (mitra_id_filter IS NULL OR customer_id = mitra_id_filter)
        AND (start_date_filter IS NULL OR tanggal_pesanan >= start_date_filter)
        AND (end_date_filter IS NULL OR tanggal_pesanan <= end_date_filter)
    ORDER BY
        created_at DESC;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_dashboard_charts_data(start_date text, end_date text)
 RETURNS TABLE(daily_sales jsonb, category_sales jsonb)
 LANGUAGE sql
AS $function$
WITH transactions_in_range AS (
    SELECT created_at, total_akhir, items
    FROM public.transactions
    WHERE created_at >= start_date::timestamp AND created_at <= end_date::timestamp
),
daily_summary AS (
    SELECT
        date_trunc('day', created_at)::date AS transaction_date,
        sum(total_akhir) AS total
    FROM transactions_in_range
    GROUP BY transaction_date
),
all_items AS (
    SELECT (item->>'kategori') as kategori,
           ((item->>'harga_jual')::numeric * (item->>'quantity')::numeric) as total
    FROM transactions_in_range, jsonb_array_elements(items) as item
    WHERE item->>'harga_grosir_deal' IS NULL AND item->>'kategori' IS NOT NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT p.kategori,
           ((item->>'harga_grosir_deal')::numeric * (item->>'kuantitas')::numeric) as total
    FROM transactions_in_range, jsonb_array_elements(items) as item
    JOIN public.products p ON p.id = (item->>'product_id')::uuid
    WHERE item->>'harga_grosir_deal' IS NOT NULL AND p.kategori IS NOT NULL
),
category_summary AS (
    SELECT kategori, sum(total) as total
    FROM all_items
    GROUP BY kategori
)
SELECT
    (SELECT jsonb_object_agg(transaction_date, total) FROM daily_summary) as daily_sales,
    (SELECT jsonb_object_agg(kategori, total) FROM category_summary) as category_sales;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_distinct_merek()
 RETURNS TABLE(merek text)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT DISTINCT p.merek
    FROM public.products p
    WHERE p.merek IS NOT NULL AND p.merek <> ''
    ORDER BY p.merek;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.search_purchase_orders(search_term text, status_filter text, supplier_id_filter uuid, start_date_filter date, end_date_filter date)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, po_number text, order_date date, status text, nama_supplier text, created_at timestamp with time zone)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT
        po.id,
        po.po_number,
        po.order_date,
        po.status,
        s.nama_supplier,
        po.created_at
    FROM
        public.purchase_orders AS po
    LEFT JOIN
        public.suppliers AS s ON po.supplier_id = s.id
    WHERE
        (
            search_term IS NULL OR search_term = '' OR
            po.po_number ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            s.nama_supplier ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%'
        )
        AND (status_filter = 'semua' OR po.status = status_filter)
        AND (supplier_id_filter IS NULL OR po.supplier_id = supplier_id_filter)
        AND (start_date_filter IS NULL OR po.order_date >= start_date_filter)
        AND (end_date_filter IS NULL OR po.order_date <= end_date_filter)
    ORDER BY
        po.created_at DESC NULLS LAST;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_special_prices_for_customer(customer_uuid uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, harga_spesial numeric, product_id uuid, kode text, nama text, ukuran text, harga_grosir_default numeric)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT
        dhm.id,
        dhm.harga_spesial,
        p.id AS product_id,
        p.kode,
        p.nama,
        p.ukuran,
        p.harga_grosir AS harga_grosir_default
    FROM
        public.daftar_harga_mitra AS dhm
    JOIN
        public.products AS p ON dhm.product_id = p.id
    WHERE
        dhm.customer_id = customer_uuid;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.process_po_receipt_v2(p_po_id uuid, p_invoice_image_url text, p_shipping_cost numeric, p_discount_amount numeric, p_other_costs numeric, p_payment_status text, p_due_date date, p_total_amount numeric, p_items jsonb)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    item_data record; -- Menggunakan 'record' untuk loop
    v_po_number text;
BEGIN
    -- Ambil nomor PO untuk keterangan log
    SELECT po_number INTO v_po_number FROM public.purchase_orders WHERE id = p_po_id;

    -- Update tabel purchase_orders utama dengan Total Akhir dari Frontend
    UPDATE public.purchase_orders
    SET
        status = 'Selesai',
        invoice_image_url = p_invoice_image_url,
        shipping_cost = p_shipping_cost,
        discount_amount = p_discount_amount,
        other_costs = p_other_costs,
        payment_status = p_payment_status,
        due_date = p_due_date,
        total_amount = p_total_amount
    WHERE id = p_po_id;

    -- Loop melalui setiap item
    FOR item_data IN SELECT * FROM jsonb_populate_recordset(null::po_item_receipt_type, p_items)
    LOOP
        -- Update item PO dengan kuantitas diterima dan harga final
        UPDATE public.purchase_order_items 
        SET 
            quantity_received = item_data.quantity_received, 
            purchase_price = item_data.final_landed_cost 
        WHERE id = item_data.po_item_id;

        -- Update produk: tambah stok, perbarui harga beli, dan harga jual jika ada
        UPDATE public.products 
        SET 
            stok = stok + item_data.quantity_to_add_to_stock, 
            harga_beli = item_data.final_landed_cost, 
            harga_jual = COALESCE(item_data.new_selling_price, harga_jual), 
            updated_at = now() 
        WHERE id = item_data.product_id;

        -- Masukkan log penambahan stok
        INSERT INTO public.stock_logs (product_id, perubahan, keterangan) 
        VALUES (item_data.product_id, item_data.quantity_to_add_to_stock, 'Penerimaan dari PO #' || v_po_number);
    END LOOP;
    
    -- BLOK INSERT KE EXPENSES SUDAH DIHAPUS DARI SINI

END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.backfill_total_terjual()
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- Buat tabel sementara untuk menampung semua item yang terjual
    CREATE TEMP TABLE sales_aggregation AS
    -- Ambil item dari transaksi POS
    SELECT
        (item->>'id')::uuid AS product_id,
        (item->>'quantity')::integer AS quantity
    FROM
        public.transactions,
        jsonb_array_elements(items) AS item
    WHERE
        item ? 'harga_jual' -- Ciri khas item POS

    UNION ALL

    -- Ambil item dari transaksi Grosir
    SELECT
        (item->>'product_id')::uuid AS product_id,
        (item->>'kuantitas')::integer AS quantity
    FROM
        public.transactions,
        jsonb_array_elements(items) AS item
    WHERE
        item ? 'harga_grosir_deal'; -- Ciri khas item Grosir

    -- Update tabel products dengan data yang sudah dihitung
    UPDATE public.products p
    SET
        total_terjual = aggregated.total_sold
    FROM (
        SELECT
            product_id,
            SUM(quantity) as total_sold
        FROM
            sales_aggregation
        GROUP BY
            product_id
    ) AS aggregated
    WHERE
        p.id = aggregated.product_id;

    -- Hapus tabel sementara setelah selesai
    DROP TABLE sales_aggregation;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_related_products(p_product_id uuid, p_merek text, p_lini_produk text)
 RETURNS SETOF products
 LANGUAGE sql
AS $function$
    SELECT *
    FROM public.products
    WHERE
        status = 'Aktif'
        AND merek = p_merek
        AND lini_produk = p_lini_produk
        AND id != p_product_id -- Jangan tampilkan produk yang sedang dilihat
    ORDER BY
        total_terjual DESC, nama ASC
    LIMIT 10; -- Batasi 10 produk terkait
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_products_for_special_price_editor(p_customer_id uuid, p_search_term text, p_kategori_filter text, p_merek_filter text)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, kode text, nama text, merek text, harga_grosir numeric, harga_spesial numeric)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT
        p.id,
        p.kode,
        p.nama,
        p.merek,
        p.harga_grosir,
        dhm.harga_spesial
    FROM
        public.products p
    LEFT JOIN
        public.daftar_harga_mitra dhm ON p.id = dhm.product_id AND dhm.customer_id = p_customer_id
    WHERE
        p.status = 'Aktif'
        AND (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR p.nama ILIKE '%' || p_search_term || '%' OR p.kode ILIKE '%' || p_search_term || '%')
        AND (p_kategori_filter = 'semua' OR p.kategori = p_kategori_filter)
        AND (p_merek_filter = 'semua' OR p.merek = p_merek_filter)
    ORDER BY
        p.nama;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.find_closest_colors(input_hex text)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, nama text, sku text, merek text, color_hex text, image_url text, color_swatch_url text, distance double precision)
 LANGUAGE sql
AS $function$
    SELECT
        p.id,
        p.nama,
        p.sku,
        p.merek,
        p.color_hex,
        p.image_url,
        p.color_swatch_url,
        -- PERBAIKAN UTAMA: Hitung jarak dengan mengakses elemen array secara langsung
        SQRT(
            POWER( (public.hex_to_rgb(p.color_hex))[1] - (public.hex_to_rgb(input_hex))[1], 2) +
            POWER( (public.hex_to_rgb(p.color_hex))[2] - (public.hex_to_rgb(input_hex))[2], 2) +
            POWER( (public.hex_to_rgb(p.color_hex))[3] - (public.hex_to_rgb(input_hex))[3], 2)
        ) as distance
    FROM
        public.products p
    WHERE
        p.kategori = 'Pilok' AND p.color_hex IS NOT NULL
    ORDER BY
        distance ASC -- Urutkan dari yang paling mirip
    LIMIT 5;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_transaction_summary()
 RETURNS TABLE(today numeric, unpaid numeric, "thisMonth" bigint)
 LANGUAGE sql
AS $function$
    select
        coalesce(sum(case when date(created_at) = current_date then total_akhir else 0 end), 0) as today,
        coalesce(sum(case when status_pembayaran = 'Belum Lunas' then sisa_hutang else 0 end), 0) as unpaid,
        count(case when date_trunc('month', created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date) then 1 end) as "thisMonth"
    from public.transactions;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_products_for_special_price_editor(p_customer_id uuid, p_search_term text, p_kategori_filter text, p_merek_filter text, p_ukuran_filter text)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, kode text, nama text, merek text, harga_grosir numeric, harga_spesial numeric)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT
        p.id,
        p.kode,
        p.nama,
        p.merek,
        p.harga_grosir,
        dhm.harga_spesial
    FROM
        public.products p
    LEFT JOIN
        public.daftar_harga_mitra dhm ON p.id = dhm.product_id AND dhm.customer_id = p_customer_id
    WHERE
        p.status = 'Aktif'
        AND (p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR p.nama ILIKE '%' || p_search_term || '%' OR p.kode ILIKE '%' || p_search_term || '%')
        AND (p_kategori_filter = 'semua' OR p.kategori = p_kategori_filter)
        AND (p_merek_filter = 'semua' OR p.merek = p_merek_filter)
        AND (p_ukuran_filter = 'semua' OR p.ukuran = p_ukuran_filter); -- <-- TAMBAHAN BARU
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.search_products(search_term text, merek_filter text, kategori_filter text, status_filter text, supplier_filter text, low_stock_only boolean)
 RETURNS SETOF products
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$ -- <-- Menggunakan struktur return yang benar
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT *
    FROM public.products
    WHERE
        (
            search_term IS NULL OR search_term = '' OR
            kode ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            nama ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            merek ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%' OR
            kategori ILIKE '%' || search_term || '%'
        )
        AND (merek_filter = 'semua' OR merek ILIKE merek_filter)
        AND (kategori_filter = 'semua' OR kategori ILIKE kategori_filter)
        AND (status_filter = 'semua' OR status ILIKE status_filter)
        AND (supplier_filter = 'semua' OR supplier ILIKE supplier_filter)
        -- Ini satu-satunya baris logika yang diubah dari kode asli Anda
        AND (low_stock_only = false OR (stok <= stok_min))
    ORDER BY
        updated_at DESC NULLS LAST;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_best_selling_products(start_date text, end_date text, category_filter text DEFAULT NULL::text)
 RETURNS TABLE(id uuid, kode text, sku text, nama text, merek text, kategori text, nama_supplier text, total_terjual numeric, stok_saat_ini integer, stok_minimal integer)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    WITH all_items AS (
        -- Ambil item dari transaksi POS (struktur lama)
        SELECT
            (item->>'id')::uuid AS product_id,
            (item->>'quantity')::numeric AS quantity
        FROM
            public.transactions,
            jsonb_array_elements(items) AS item
        WHERE
            created_at >= start_date::timestamp AND created_at <= end_date::timestamp
            AND item->>'harga_grosir_deal' IS NULL -- Ciri khas item POS

        UNION ALL

        -- Ambil item dari transaksi Grosir (struktur baru)
        SELECT
            (item->>'product_id')::uuid AS product_id,
            (item->>'kuantitas')::numeric AS quantity
        FROM
            public.transactions,
            jsonb_array_elements(items) AS item
        WHERE
            created_at >= start_date::timestamp AND created_at <= end_date::timestamp
            AND item->>'harga_grosir_deal' IS NOT NULL -- Ciri khas item Grosir
    )
    SELECT
        p.id,
        p.kode,
        p.sku, -- <-- Mengambil kolom baru
        p.nama,
        p.merek,
        p.kategori,
        s.nama_supplier,
        sum(ai.quantity) AS total_terjual,
        p.stok AS stok_saat_ini,
        p.stok_min AS stok_minimal
    FROM
        all_items ai
    JOIN
        public.products p ON ai.product_id = p.id
    LEFT JOIN
        public.suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.id
    WHERE
        (category_filter IS NULL OR p.kategori = category_filter)
    GROUP BY
        p.id, s.nama_supplier
    ORDER BY
        total_terjual DESC;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.search_and_sort_products(p_kategori text, p_merek text, p_lini_produk text, p_color_variant text, p_ukuran text, p_sort_by text, p_search_term text)
 RETURNS SETOF products
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT *
    FROM public.products
    WHERE
        status = 'Aktif'
        AND (p_kategori IS NULL OR kategori = p_kategori)
        AND (p_merek IS NULL OR merek = p_merek)
        AND (p_lini_produk IS NULL OR lini_produk = p_lini_produk)
        AND (p_color_variant IS NULL OR color_variant = p_color_variant) -- <-- Filter baru
        AND (p_ukuran IS NULL OR ukuran = p_ukuran)
        AND (
            p_search_term IS NULL OR p_search_term = '' OR
            nama ILIKE '%' || p_search_term || '%' OR
            sku ILIKE '%' || p_search_term || '%'
        )
    ORDER BY
        CASE WHEN p_sort_by = 'terbaru' THEN created_at END DESC,
        CASE WHEN p_sort_by = 'terlaris' THEN total_terjual END DESC NULLS LAST,
        CASE WHEN p_sort_by = 'harga_asc' THEN harga_jual END ASC,
        CASE WHEN p_sort_by = 'harga_desc' THEN harga_jual END DESC,
        nama ASC;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.confirm_sales_order(order_id uuid)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    item RECORD;
BEGIN
    -- Update status pesanan menjadi 'Dikonfirmasi'
    UPDATE public.sales_orders
    SET status = 'Dikonfirmasi'
    WHERE id = order_id AND status = 'Draft';

    -- Jika tidak ada baris yang diupdate (karena status bukan 'Draft'), keluar.
    IF NOT FOUND THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'Pesanan tidak ditemukan atau statusnya bukan Draft.';
    END IF;

    -- Loop melalui setiap item di pesanan untuk mengalokasikan stok
    FOR item IN
        SELECT product_id, kuantitas FROM public.sales_order_items WHERE sales_order_id = order_id
    LOOP
        UPDATE public.products
        SET stok_dialokasikan = stok_dialokasikan + item.kuantitas
        WHERE id = item.product_id;
    END LOOP;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.calculate_profit_loss(start_date text, end_date text)
 RETURNS TABLE(total_pendapatan numeric, total_hpp numeric, laba_kotor numeric, total_pengeluaran numeric, laba_bersih numeric)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_total_pendapatan numeric;
    v_total_hpp numeric;
    v_laba_kotor numeric;
    v_total_pengeluaran numeric;
    v_laba_bersih numeric;
BEGIN
    -- 1. Hitung Total Pendapatan
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_akhir), 0)
    INTO v_total_pendapatan
    FROM public.transactions
    WHERE created_at >= start_date::timestamp AND created_at <= end_date::timestamp;

    -- 2. Hitung Total Pengeluaran
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(jumlah), 0)
    INTO v_total_pengeluaran
    FROM public.expenses
    WHERE tanggal >= start_date::timestamp AND tanggal <= end_date::timestamp;

    -- 3. Hitung Total HPP
    WITH all_sold_items AS (
        -- Ambil item dari transaksi POS
        SELECT
            (item->>'id')::uuid AS product_id,
            (item->>'quantity')::numeric AS quantity,
            (item->>'harga_beli')::numeric AS purchase_price
        FROM 
            public.transactions t, -- <-- TAMBAHKAN ALIAS 't'
            jsonb_array_elements(items) AS item
        WHERE 
            t.created_at >= start_date::timestamp AND t.created_at <= end_date::timestamp -- <-- PERBAIKI: Gunakan t.created_at
            AND item->>'harga_grosir_deal' IS NULL

        UNION ALL

        -- Ambil item dari transaksi Grosir
        SELECT
            (item->>'product_id')::uuid AS product_id,
            (item->>'kuantitas')::numeric AS quantity,
            p.harga_beli AS purchase_price
        FROM 
            public.transactions t, -- <-- TAMBAHKAN ALIAS 't'
            jsonb_array_elements(items) AS item
        JOIN 
            public.products p ON p.id = (item->>'product_id')::uuid
        WHERE 
            t.created_at >= start_date::timestamp AND t.created_at <= end_date::timestamp -- <-- PERBAIKI: Gunakan t.created_at
            AND item->>'harga_grosir_deal' IS NOT NULL
    )
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(quantity * purchase_price), 0)
    INTO v_total_hpp
    FROM all_sold_items;

    -- 4. Hitung Laba Kotor dan Laba Bersih
    v_laba_kotor := v_total_pendapatan - v_total_hpp;
    v_laba_bersih := v_laba_kotor - v_total_pengeluaran;

    -- 5. Kembalikan semua hasil
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT
        v_total_pendapatan,
        v_total_hpp,
        v_laba_kotor,
        v_total_pengeluaran,
        v_laba_bersih;
END;
$function$
